info.title: DESCRIPTION
info.body: Konstrukt™ Permaplast™ K-231 Deco Render is an acrylic, polymer-based exterior wall coating that is combined with various sizes of aggregates to impart a textured finish.

info.title: SURFACE PREPARATION
info.body: Make sure that the surface is clean and dry, free from oil, grease, dust, dirt, and other foreign matter.

info.title: APPLICATION SCHEDULE
info.body:
Apply K-231 Deco Render onto the substrate by using a stainless steel trowel.
The finish should be troweled lightly to the thickness of the largest aggregate.
If a circular texturing is desired, use a trowel or float.
Maintaining a wet edge float finishes 5-8 minutes after the initial application.
Let the product cure overnight prior to the application of a topcoat.
